caption: This image features a serene natural landscape. In the foreground, there's a pathway going up a gentle hill, flanked by abundant greenery and patches of red wildflowers. On this path, four people are visible: two are riding horses while the other two are walking beside them. The background showcases a wide river, reflecting the hues of the sky and creating a serene setting. Beyond the river, there are gentle hills that gradually transform into a residential area with houses scattered throughout, offering a glimpse into the rural or suburban lifestyle. The atmosphere is tranquil, bathed in the soft light of what appears to be early evening or late afternoon, casting longer shadows and enriching the colors of the natural surroundings.
title: A new development overlooks Upper Newport Bay, near Newport Beach, scheduled for development as a yacht harbor, is an excellent example of a bird refuge. The state's coastal waters and lands provide a habitat for more than 108 species and subspecies of mammals, 260 birds, 54 reptiles and amphibians, and a wide variety of fish. Since 1900 coastal wetlands needed for their survival have decreased from 381,000 to 125,000 acres.
